duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage expense authorizations and audit travel expense reports within the Accounting department.
Use T&E software self-sufficiently and guide end users through the process.
Ensure compliance with company T&E policies and procedures through proactive communication with end users.
Coordinate with Accounts Payable to meet T&E/AP deadlines and ensure accurate and efficient processing of transactions.
Execute and distribute T&E transaction reporting dashboards to Accounting/Finance leadership.
Provide support and training opportunities to company end users as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting, Finance, Business or related field. 4 years+plus experience may be considered in lieu of degree.
